trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosed" /> and <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosing" /> events.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce i dati per gli eventi <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosed" /> e <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosing" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosed> event occurs when a designer finalizes a transaction.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosed> evento si verifica quando una finestra di progettazione consente di finalizzare una transazione.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates creating a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come creare un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: per l'accesso completo alle risorse di sistema.

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: Valori richiesta: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: Stato associato:

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the transaction was committed.
trans-unit.target: Valore che indica se è stato eseguito il commit della transazione.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs" /> class, using the specified value that indicates whether the designer called <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit" /> on the transaction.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs" /> utilizzando il valore specificato che indica se la finestra di progettazione ha chiamato <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit" /> sulla transazione.

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: per l'accesso completo alle risorse di sistema.

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: Valori richiesta: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: Stato associato:

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the transaction was committed.
trans-unit.target: Valore che indica se è stato eseguito il commit della transazione.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this is the last transaction to close; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se è l'ultima transazione da chiudere, altrimenti <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: If `commit` is `true`, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs.LastTransaction%2A> property defaults to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se `commit` è `true`, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs.LastTransaction%2A> valore predefinito di proprietà `true`.

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: per l'accesso completo alle risorse di sistema.

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: Valori richiesta: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: Stato associato:

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this is the last transaction to close.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se si tratta dell'ultima transazione da chiudere.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if this is the last transaction to close; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se è l'ultima transazione da chiudere, altrimenti <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: per l'accesso completo alle risorse di sistema.

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: Valori richiesta: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: Stato associato:

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the designer called <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit" /> on the transaction.
trans-unit.target: Indica se la finestra di progettazione ha chiamato <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit" /> sulla transazione.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the designer called <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit" /> on the transaction; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se la finestra di progettazione ha chiamato <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit" /> sulla transazione. <see langword="false" /> in caso contrario.

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: per l'accesso completo alle risorse di sistema.

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: Valori richiesta: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
